NAME: CPSC Req
requirements: CPSC 201; CPSC 202 or MATH 244; CPSC 223, CPSC 323; CPSC  365 or 366; CPSC 490;

NAME: ECON Req
requirements: ECON 115 or ECON 108;  ECON 116 or ECON 111; MATH 112 or MATH 115 or MATH 120; ECON 121 or ECON 125; ECON 122 or ECON 126; ECON 117;

NAME: ECON Elec
requirements: ECON num (where num > 126) * 4; ECON num (where 400 < num < 492) * 2;

NAME: AFAM Req
requirements: AFAM 160, AFAM 162, AFAM 410, AFAM 480, AFAM 491; AFAM num (where num[skill] == HU) * 1; AFAM num (where num[skill] == SO) * 1;
